title: First pick is hard
body: I don't know why but whenever i am first pick it usually ends up in a defeat. Every time it happens I always get counter picked so hard and cant really do anything in game. I

replies.body: I'm right there with you bud. Remember that you can always ask to trade with someone if you are forced to pick a lane blind. Sometimes no one responds and that sucks which means you might also want to figure out who your safest laners are, maybe with strong team fight presence, so that you can survive the laning phase and get right into the mid game with full force.
